Posts.Content: InfoSeeker2008 wrote: Hi All, I am waiting for my results from the Oncotype DX -Tailor X trial here in Canada.  Are there any other participants out there who received there results?  Were they okay with the results in respect to the trial?  ie. score coming back between 12 and 25 and the randomly being assigned to chemo or not.  I am afraid that if my score comes back at 12 and I am randomly assigned to chemo I may not be able to go through with it.  Also were you as a particiant able to get a copy of the recurrance report? Would like to hear from other participants. Thanks Dx 10/28/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: TailorX Trial InfoSeeker2008 Lories
